title: Frostpunk 2: Digital Artbook & “Warm Flesh” Novella
description: Take a step into the world of Frostpunk 2 thanks to an exceptional digital artbook filled to the brim with inspiring, cold aesthetics. The artbook is accompanied by a brutal yet captivating “Warm Flesh” novella set in the game’s universe and written by Jakub nowak.
longDescription:
<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Artbook
<!--text-->
Since the creation of the first Frostpunk, its world has grown wider and richer in detail. This artbook shows different facets of the world encased in the endless sea of ice. From the hardened citizens of a post-apocalyptic society to the city’s cold, industrial architecture and frostland’s raw beauty, you will witness the lore of Frostpunk in its full glory.

It's a story about the art, but also the design without which the art could not come to be. It's a story about the design, which without art would remain dry, abstract and lifeless.
Kuba Stokalski, game co-director

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Warm flesh novella
<!--text-->
Mankind's struggle for order in a world full of chaos and destruction is one of the main motifs in Warm Flesh. This novella is set in the world of Frostpunk and written by the award-winning author Jakub Nowak. The story is a part of a larger, upcoming anthology that takes you to the harsh, yet fascinating world after an icy apocalypse almost wiped out entire humanity.
